data.name: Sample - GitHub - 1.2.0
data.description: GitHub is a code hosting platform for collaboration and version control. This connector facilitates automated interactions with GitHub, such as to create and manage repositories, branches, issues, pull requests, and many more.

workflows.description: Creates a new organization or an authenticated user repository based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Repository

workflows.description: Creates a new repository using a template based on the template owner, template repository name, new repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Repository Using Template

workflows.description: Lists all the repositories of an organization based on the organization name, repository type, sort criteria, sort order, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Organization Repositories

workflows.description: Lists public repositories for the specified user based on the username, repository type, sort criteria, sort order, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List User Repositories

workflows.description: Lists repositories that the authenticated user has explicit permission (:read, :write, or :admin) to access based on the authenticated user's affiliation, repository type, sort criteria, sort order, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Authenticated User Repositories

workflows.description: Updates an organization's or an authenticated user's repository based on the old repository name, new repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Update Repository

workflows.description: Deletes an organization's or an authenticated user's repository from GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Delete Repository

workflows.description: Forks an organization's or an account owner's repository based on the repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Fork Organization Repository

workflows.description: Lists the repositories that have been forked for the specified organization based on the repository owner name, repository name, repository sort type, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Fork Repositories

workflows.description: Creates a new file or replaces an existing file in a repository based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, file name, commit message, file contents, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create or Update File Contents

arguments.title: GitHub: Create or Update File Contents

routes.name: Start-> Create or Update File Contents

workflows.description: Updates a personal repository of a specified user to add a collaborator for the repository based on the repository owner name, repository name, collaborator username, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Add Repository Collaborator

workflows.description: List the collaborator details for specified repository based on the repository owner name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Repository Collaborator

workflows.description: Retrieves branch revision details of the specified branch in GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, base branch name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Get Branch Revision

workflows.description: Creates a new branch in GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, new branch name, base branch name or SHA, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Branch

workflows.description: Merges a specified branch to the base branch in GitHub based on the repository owner name, repository name, base branch name, head branch name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Merge Branch

workflows.description: Lists branches of the specified repository based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Branches

workflows.description: Delete a new branch in GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, branch name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Delete Branch

workflows.description: Synchronizes a branch of a forked repository to keep it up-to-date with the upstream repository based on the repository owner's name, repository name, branch name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Fetch Upstream

workflows.description: Clones the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, specify if you want the repository as a .zipfile, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Clone Repository

workflows.description: Applies changes made in a FortiSOAR file to the specified remote repository that is cloned from GitHub based on the file IRI and cloned repository path you have specified
workflows.name: Update Remote Repository

workflows.description: Commits the local repository changes to the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, cloned repository path, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Push Changes

workflows.description: Creates a pull request for the specified repository on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Pull Request

workflows.description: Lists pull requests for the specified repository on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Pull Request

workflows.description: Adds reviewers for the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified. Pull request authors, repository owners, and collaborators can request a review of the pull request from anyone with write access to the repository. Each requested reviewer receives a notification asking them to review the pull request
workflows.name: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

arguments.title: GitHub: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

steps.name: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

arguments.name: GitHub
arguments.operationTitle: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

routes.name: Start-> Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

workflows.description: Lists the review comments associated with the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Review Comments on a Pull Request

arguments.title: GitHub: List Review Comments on a Pull Request

steps.name: List Review Comments on a Pull Request

arguments.name: GitHub
arguments.operationTitle: List Review Comments on a Pull Request

routes.name: Start-> List Review Comments on a Pull Request

workflows.description: Lists the reviews associated with the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Pull Request Reviews

workflows.description: Adds a review for a pull request on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Add Pull Request Review

workflows.description: Merges the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Merge Pull Request

workflows.description: Creates an issue for the specified repository or user on GitHub based on the repository type, organization, or repository owner's name, repository name, title, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Issue

workflows.description: List issues for the specified repository or user on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Repository Issue

workflows.description: Update issues for the specified repository or user on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, update number, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Update Issue

workflows.description: Creates an issue comment for the specified repository or user on GitHub based on the repository type, organization, or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Issue Comment

workflows.description: Creates a release for the specified repository on GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, tag name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Create Release

workflows.description: Returns a list of releases that does not include regular GitHub tags associated with a release. Information about published releases is available to everyone. Only users with push access will receive listings for draft releases. The list of releases is retrieved from GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Releases

workflows.description: Lists the people that have marked the specified repository in GitHub with a star based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Stargazers

workflows.description: Stars the specified repository for the authenticated user in GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and repository owner you have specified
workflows.name: Star Repository

workflows.description: Lists the people that are watching the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: List Watchers

workflows.description: Sets the subscription to the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository type, organization or repository owner's name, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified
workflows.name: Set Repository Subscription
Get Server URL
workflows.description: Retrieves the server URL (Web URL) of the configured GitLab server.

workflows.name: GitHub - Create Issue Comment
workflows.description: Creates an issue comment for the specified repository or user on GitHub

steps.name: Add a Comment to an Issue

routes.name: Start -> Add a Comment to an Issue

workflows.name: GitHub - List Pull Request Reviews
workflows.description: Lists the reviews associated with the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Create Issue
workflows.description: Creates an issue for the specified repository or user on GitHub based on the repository name, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - List Pull Request
workflows.description: Lists pull requests for the specified repository on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Fetch Release
workflows.description: Fetches Release from the Repo

workflows.name: GitHub - List Repository Collaborator
workflows.description: List repository collaborators

workflows.name: GitHub - Create Repository
workflows.description: Creates a new organization or authenticated user repository based on the repository name, organization name, base branch name, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Create Pull Request
workflows.description: Creates a pull request for the specified repository on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Create or Update File Content
workflows.description: Creates a new repository using a repository template based on the template repository, repository name, and other input parameters you have specified

routes.name: Start -> Create or Update File Content

workflows.name: GitHub - Update Issue
workflows.description: Update an issues for the specified repository or user on GitHub based on the repository name, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Add Repository Collaborator
workflows.description: Updates a personal repository of a specified user to add a collaborator

workflows.name: GitHub - Push Changes
workflows.description: Commits the local repository changes to the specified repository in GitHub based on the repository name, cloned repository path, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Create Branch
workflows.description: Creates a new branch in GitHub based on the repository name, base branch type, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Clone Repository
workflows.description: Clone the github repository

workflows.name: GitHub - List Repository Issue
workflows.description: List an issues for the specified repository or user on GitHub based on the repository name, and other input parameters you have specified

arguments.data:
{% set _list = [] %}
{% for issue in vars.steps.List_Repository_Issue.data %}{% set _temp = _list.append({"id": issue.id, "html_url": issue.html_url,"number": (issue.number | string),"title": issue.title,"body": issue.body,"reporterUsername": issue.user.login,"assigneeUsername": issue.assignee.login if issue.assignee else "","state": issue.state, "repository_url": issue.repository_url}) %}{% endfor %}{{_list}}

workflows.name: GitHub - Add Pull Request Review
workflows.description: Add a review for a pull request on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Add Reviewers for a Pull Request
workflows.description: Adds reviews for the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified

arguments.name: GitHub
arguments.operationTitle: Add Reviewers for a Pull Request

workflows.name: GitHub - Merge Pull Request
workflows.description: Merges the specified pull request on GitHub based on the repository name, repository owner, pull request number, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Update Remote Repository
workflows.description: Applies changes made in a FortiSOAR file to the specified remote repository that is cloned from GitHub based on the file IRI and cloned repository path you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Create Release
workflows.description: Create a new release

workflows.name: GitHub - Delete Branch
workflows.description: Delete a new branch in GitHub based on the repository name, branch name, repository owner, and other input parameters you have specified

workflows.name: GitHub - Get Server URL
workflows.description: Retrieves the server URL (Web URL) of the configured GitLab server.
